title: FiscalNote Closes Previously Announced Balance Sheet Realignment
description: FiscalNote Closes Previously Announced Balance Sheet Realignment  Morningstar
summary: FiscalNote Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: NOTE), a provider of AI-driven policy and regulatory intelligence solutions, has closed a series of transactions to refinance its senior debt and restructure substantially all of its subordinated debt. These transactions provide FiscalNote with a clear, long-term runway and increased operating flexibility as it continues to execute its product-led growth strategy. Additional disclosures are required in the Company’s Q2 2025 Form 10-Q filing. The filing deadline for this filing has been extended to August 18. Some forward-looking statements may be considered forward due to factors such as concentration of revenues from U.S. government agencies, changes in U.K. government spending priorities, dependence on winning or renewing government contracts, potential technical disruptions, cyber security incidents, and ongoing integration projects.
shortSummary: FiscalNote Holdings, Inc. closed transactions to restructure its debt and enhance profitability, but risks and uncertainties remain in its growth strategy and operations.
argos_summary: FiscalNote Holdings, Inc. has successfully closed transactions to refinance its senior debt and restructure most of its subordinated debt, enhancing its operational flexibility and supporting its product-led growth strategy. The company plans to file a Form 12b-25 to extend the deadline for its Q2 2025 Form 10-Q to August 18, allowing time for additional disclosures. FiscalNote emphasizes that its forward-looking statements are subject to various risks and uncertainties that could affect its future performance.
